properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Provincetown MA to Chatham MA to Nantucket MA out 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 9 at 7:32AM EST until February 9 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Boston/Norton MA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northeast winds 5 to 10 kt and seas 2 to 4 feet.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Provincetown MA to Chatham MA to
Nantucket MA out 20 nm.

* WHEN...Until 10 AM EST this morning.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING
